question_stem: In which of the following situations is simulation modeling appropriate?
question_stem_html: In which of the following situations is simulation modeling appropriate?

choices.text: A company wants to understand if a customer will churn using historical customer behavior.
A hospital explores the impact of different staffing levels on ER wait times during peak hours.
choices.explanation: Correct: Simulation modeling (exploring staffing levels and their impact on wait times).

choices.text: A retail chain wants to identify subsets of customers based on purchasing patterns.
choices.explanation: Incorrect: Unsupervised learning (grouping customers based on purchasing patterns without labels).

choices.text: A company assesses how different weather patterns might affect delivery times to adjust routing.
choices.explanation: Correct: Simulation modeling (assessing how weather affects delivery times).

items.solution_html: Correct: B, D. Simulation is suitable for system behavior under scenarios and uncertainty (staffing → wait, weather → travel times). A and C are ML tasks.
